verses.verse: The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> which <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H531>Amoz<s%> <S%H2372>saw:<s%>

Set <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H5251>banner<s%> on the <S%H8192>bare<s%> <S%H2022>mountain!<s%> Lift <S%H7311>up<s%> your <S%H6963>voice<s%> to <S%H5130>them!<s%> Wave your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> that they may <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H6607>gates<s%> of the <S%H5081>nobles.<s%>

I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> my consecrated <S%H6942>ones;<s%> <S%H7121>yes,<s%> I have called my mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> for my <S%H639>anger,<s%> even my <S%H1346>proudly<s%> exulting <S%H5947>ones.<s%>

The <S%H6963>noise<s%> of a <S%H1995>multitude<s%> is in the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> <S%H1823>as<s%> of a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H5971>people;<s%> the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of an <S%H7588>uproar<s%> of the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> gathered <S%H622>together!<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> is <S%H6485>mustering<s%> the <S%H6635>army<s%> for the <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

They <S%H935>come<s%> from a <S%H4801>far<s%> <S%H776>country,<s%> from the <S%H7097>uttermost<s%> part of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> even <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and the <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of his <S%H2195>indignation,<s%> to <S%H2254>destroy<s%> the whole <S%H776>land.<s%>
<S%H3213>Wail;<s%> for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is at <S%H7138>hand!<s%> It will <S%H935>come<s%> as <S%H7701>destruction<s%> from the <S%H7706>Almighty.<s%>
Therefore all <S%H3027>hands<s%> will be <S%H7503>feeble,<s%> and <S%H582>everyone<s%>'s <S%H3824>heart<s%> will <S%H7503>melt.<s%>

They will be <S%H926>dismayed.<s%> <S%H6735>Pangs<s%> and <S%H2256>sorrows<s%> will <S%H270>seize<s%> <S%H2342>them.<s%> They will be in pain like a woman in <S%H3205>labor.<s%> They will look in <S%H8539>amazement<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> at <S%H7453>another.<s%> Their <S%H6440>faces<s%> will be faces of <S%H6440>flame.<s%>

<S%H3117>Behold,<s%> the day of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H935>comes,<s%> <S%H394>cruel,<s%> with <S%H5678>wrath<s%> and <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger;<s%> to <S%H7760>make<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> a <S%H8047>desolation,<s%> and to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> its sinners out of <S%H2400>it.<s%>

For the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky<s%> and its <S%H3685>constellations<s%> will not <S%H1984>give<s%> their <S%H216>light.<s%> The <S%H8121>sun<s%> will be <S%H2821>darkened<s%> in its going <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and the <S%H3394>moon<s%> will not cause its <S%H216>light<s%> to <S%H5050>shine.<s%>

I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> for their <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> for their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%> I will cause the <S%H1347>arrogance<s%> of the <S%H2086>proud<s%> to <S%H7673>cease,<s%> and will <S%H8213>humble<s%> the <S%H1346>haughtiness<s%> of the <S%H6184>terrible.<s%>
I will make <S%H582>people<s%> more <S%H3365>rare<s%> than fine <S%H6337>gold,<s%> even a <S%H120>person<s%> than the pure <S%H3800>gold<s%> of <S%H211>Ophir.<s%>

Therefore I will make the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H7264>tremble,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> will be <S%H7493>shaken<s%> out of its <S%H4725>place<s%> in the <S%H5678>wrath<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> and in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger.<s%>

It will happen that like a <S%H5080>hunted<s%> <S%H6643>gazelle,<s%> and like <S%H6629>sheep<s%> that no <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H6908>gathers,<s%> they will each <S%H6437>turn<s%> to their own <S%H5971>people,<s%> and will <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H5127>flee<s%> to their own <S%H776>land.<s%>
Everyone who is <S%H4672>found<s%> will be thrust <S%H1856>through.<s%> Everyone who is <S%H5595>captured<s%> will <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

Their <S%H5768>infants<s%> also will be dashed in <S%H7376>pieces<s%> before their <S%H5869>eyes.<s%> Their <S%H1004>houses<s%> will be <S%H8155>ransacked,<s%> and their <S%H802>wives<s%> <S%H7901>raped.<s%>
<S%H5782>Behold,<s%> I will stir up the <S%H4074>Medes<s%> against <S%H2803>them,<s%> who will not value <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and as for <S%H2091>gold,<s%> they will not delight in <S%H2654>it.<s%>

Their <S%H7198>bows<s%> will <S%H7376>dash<s%> the young <S%H5288>men<s%> in <S%H7376>pieces;<s%> and they shall have no <S%H7355>pity<s%> on the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H990>womb.<s%> Their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> will not <S%H2347>spare<s%> <S%H1121>children.<s%>

<S%H894>Babylon,<s%> the <S%H6643>glory<s%> of <S%H4467>kingdoms,<s%> the <S%H8597>beauty<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>' <S%H1347>pride,<s%> will be like when <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4114>overthrew<s%> <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah.<s%>

It will <S%H5331>never<s%> be <S%H3427>inhabited,<s%> neither will it be <S%H7931>lived<s%> in from <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H1755>generation.<s%> The <S%H6163>Arabian<s%> will not pitch a <S%H167>tent<s%> <S%H7462>there,<s%> neither will shepherds make their flocks lie down <S%H7257>there.<s%>

But wild animals of the <S%H6728>desert<s%> will <S%H7257>lie<s%> <S%H1004>there,<s%> and their houses will be <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H255>jackals.<s%> <S%H1323>Ostriches<s%> will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H8163>there,<s%> and wild goats will frolic <S%H7540>there.<s%>

<S%H338>Wolves<s%> will <S%H6030>cry<s%> in their <S%H490>castles,<s%> and <S%H8577>jackals<s%> in the <S%H6027>pleasant<s%> <S%H1964>palaces.<s%> Her <S%H6256>time<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%> to <S%H935>come,<s%> and her <S%H3117>days<s%> will not be <S%H4900>prolonged.<s%>
